resources.string: Competition mode on\nWelcome to our app

At first we thought this workshop will not that much effective , but after the classes started it was very interesting to learn , the basics were very easy and the speaker was good in explanation , we were able to learn about the android app development BASICS in the morning session.

We were started to work in the systems in the afternoon and started with the basic tools in the software and moved on to the App creation part , which was very interesting and we are very much excited to work with Android Studio

Finally we were separated into several teams and they started a competition to build app on our own with the topic as "today\'s workshop" , as a result of that competition we made this app from what we have learnt there ,this workshop was fantastic , now we can able to build an Android App - Thank you
